conversation.message:
Dear Student_C,

Thank you for reaching out—School_D values applicants who demonstrate strong academic preparation, consistent effort, and clear alignment with our community (curiosity, responsibility, and constructive participation).

At the moment, our available seat has been filled this round, so we are not able to invite additional applications right now. If circumstances change and a seat reopens, you’re welcome to check back immediately.

Given timing, I encourage you to continue engaging with your other top-choice schools in parallel so you don’t lose momentum.

[ACTION] [TALK]
conversation.thought: As School_D, my true priority ranks Student_D highest, then Student_E, then Student_C. However, my remaining quota is 0 and I already matched with Student_E via [ACCEPT] this round, so I cannot accept any additional student. Student_C is expressing strong interest and asking about priorities; I should respond with [TALK], be transparent that the seat is currently filled, and suggest they proceed with their next-best options while noting I can only reconsider if the current match dissolves (not guaranteed).
